attributes.action: Criminalise the use of “Z” Nazi symbol
attributes.additional_details: The use of “Z” Nazi symbol as a way to publicly support russian aggression against Ukraine must be criminalised and banned on public and social media, failure to comply must lead to a criminal liability
attributes.background: Russian propaganda is encouraging people to use a Nazi “Z” symbol to support the aggression against Ukraine. Moreover, russians are going to make a “victory” auto rally on the 7-8 of May in London and other big UK cities using this Nazi symbol to make chaos and riots on the streets.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614234
